activities: FindTheBest collects personal information, non-personal information, and public information in order to assemble listings for products, businesses, services or people.  Listings may include personal information such as names or address.  This information is gathered from publicly available data, purchased databases or from direct user input.  Should any user wish to have their information removed they may contact us to do so in certain cases they may remove the information from the website.
